resources.string: Hutaurwa hwetsamba pfupi kana dzine nepfenyuro dzakakwedekera kwaita nyore!
SMSSecure iapu yetsamba pfupi/tsamba dzinemidhiya inokubvumira kuti udzivirire zvinhu zvako zvinepuraivheti kana uchibatana neshamwari.

SMSSecure iapu yetsamba pfupi/ tsamba dzinemidhiya inokubvumira kuti udzivirire zvinhu zvako zvinepuraivheti kana uchibatana neshamwari. Kana uchishandisa SMSSecure unokwanisa kutumidzira tsamba pfupi nekugovedzana batanidzo dzemidhiya zvine puraivheti yakakwana. Zvicherechedzo *Inyore. SMSSecure inoshanda semamwe ma apu etsamba pfupi. Hapana zvekuti unosainira kuti uishandise uye hapana chirango chitsva chekuti shamwari dzako dzibatanidzwe. *Yakavimbika. SMSSecure inozivisa ichishandisa tsamba pfupi dzakakwedekerwa. Hapana sevha kana chihako chedandemutande chinodikanwa. *Iri puraivheti. SMSSecure inoshandisa TextSecure inepurotokori yakakwedekerwa patsamba imwe neimwe nguva yese. *Yakachengetedzeka. Tsamba dzese dzakadekerwa mumatongo, saka kana foni yako ichinge yarasika kana kubiwa, tsamba dzako dzinenge dzakabvumbamirwa. *Inenyuko yakavhurika. SMSSecure ndeyemahara uye inenyuko yakavhurika, inogonesa chero munhu kunzevera kuchengetedzeka kwayo nekushandura murau wayo.
Rukumbiro butirai chero chipfukuto, nhaurwa kana kumbiro dzecherechedzo pa: https://github.com/SMSSecure/SMSSecure/issues Nyuko zdemurau dzinowanikwa pa: https://github.com/SMSSecure/SMSSecure
Zvimwe zvizere: http://smssecure.org
